amendment.description: Amendment clarifies requirements to ensure that Manufacturing Extension Partnership (MEP) centers submit audited, annual budgets and provide financial disclosure documents consistent with OMB requirements, and that the documents be made available to the public upon request.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in House Report 108-589 to clarify requirements to ensure that MEP centers submit audited, annual budgets and provide financial disclosure documents consistent with OMB requirements. Further, these documents must be made available to the public upon request.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Peterson (PA) amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Peterson (PA).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Peterson (PA) amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
